title: The Crossbow of Carl
data:
| )   The Crossbow of Carl   *(No tile)* |                                                                                                                                             |
| -------------------------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| Base item                              | [crossbow](/wiki/Crossbow "Crossbow")                                                                                                       |
|                                        |                                                                                                                                             |
| Damage vs. small                       | 1d2 **+1d6**                                                                                                                                |
| Damage vs. large                       | 1d2 **+1d6**                                                                                                                                |
| To-hit bonus                           | **+1d5**                                                                                                                                    |
| Bonus versus                           | *(any)*                                                                                                                                     |
|                                        |                                                                                                                                             |
| Weapon skill                           | [crossbow](/wiki/Crossbow "Crossbow")                                                                                                       |
| Size                                   | one-handed                                                                                                                                  |
| Affiliation                            | - [chaotic](/wiki/Chaotic "Chaotic")
- [Ranger](/wiki/Ranger "Ranger")
- [intelligent](/wiki/Intelligent_artifacts "Intelligent artifacts") |
|                                        |                                                                                                                                             |
| When carried                           | * [telepathy](/wiki/Telepathy "Telepathy")                                                                                                  |
| When wielded                           | - [reflection](/wiki/Reflection "Reflection")                                                                                               |
| When [invoked](/wiki/Invoke "Invoke")  | * creates [crossbow bolts](/wiki/Crossbow_bolt "Crossbow bolt")                                                                             |
|                                        |                                                                                                                                             |
| Base price                             | 4000 [zm](/wiki/Zorkmid "Zorkmid")                                                                                                          |
| Weight                                 | [30](/wiki/Weight "Weight")                                                                                                                 |
| Material                               | [wood](/wiki/Wood "Wood")                                                                                                                   |

**The Crossbow of Carl** is the [Gnomish](/wiki/Gnome_\(starting_race\) "Gnome (starting race)") and [Hobbit](/wiki/Hobbit_\(starting_race\) "Hobbit (starting race)") [Ranger](/wiki/Ranger "Ranger") [quest artifact](/wiki/Quest_artifact "Quest artifact") in [EvilHack](/wiki/EvilHack "EvilHack") and [Hack'EM](/wiki/Hack%27EM "Hack'EM"). It is the prize given for completing the [Ranger quest](/wiki/Ranger_quest "Ranger quest") in place of [The Longbow of Diana](/wiki/The_Longbow_of_Diana "The Longbow of Diana"), and is [chaotic](/wiki/Chaotic "Chaotic") for [wishing](/wiki/Wishing "Wishing") purposes. Its [base item](/wiki/Base_item "Base item") type is a [crossbow](/wiki/Crossbow "Crossbow").

## Description

The Crossbow of Carl has almost the exact same traits as the Longbow of Diana: while carried, it confers [telepathy](/wiki/Telepathy "Telepathy"); while wielded, it confers [reflection](/wiki/Reflection "Reflection") and grants a +d5 to-hit bonus and +d6 damage bonus to [crossbow bolts](/wiki/Crossbow_bolt "Crossbow bolt") [fired](/wiki/Firing "Firing") from it; and [invoking](/wiki/Invoking "Invoking") the Crossbow creates bolts with the same [beatitude](/wiki/Beatitude "Beatitude") as the bow, with a small chance of producing [poisoned](/wiki/Poisoned "Poisoned") bolts. As with the Longbow, beatitude also influences the amount of bolts created with each invoke, with a blessed Crossbow creating more bolts and a cursed Crossbow creating fewer. Additionally, the Crossbow of Carl in a gnomish/hobbit Ranger's possession is magically lightened to 24 [aum](/wiki/Aum "Aum"), the same weight as the Longbow.

## Strategy

- *See also: [Invoke § Optimum invocation schedule](/wiki/Invoke#Optimum_invocation_schedule "Invoke")*

* *This page is a **[stub](/wiki/Category:Stubs "Category:Stubs")**. Should you wish to do so, you can contribute by [**expanding this page**.](https://nethackwiki.com/index.php?title=The_Crossbow_of_Carl\&action=edit)*

The Crossbow of Carl

From NetHackWiki
Jump to navigation Jump to search
)   The Crossbow of Carl   (No tile)

Base price 4000 zm
Weight 30

The Crossbow of Carl is the Gnomish and Hobbit Ranger quest artifact in EvilHack and Hack'EM. It is the prize given for completing the Ranger quest in place of The Longbow of Diana, and is chaotic for wishing purposes. Its base item type is a crossbow.

Description

The Crossbow of Carl has almost the exact same traits as the Longbow of Diana: while carried, it confers telepathy; while wielded, it confers reflection and grants a +d5 to-hit bonus and +d6 damage bonus to crossbow bolts fired from it; and invoking the Crossbow creates bolts with the same beatitude as the bow, with a small chance of producing poisoned bolts. As with the Longbow, beatitude also influences the amount of bolts created with each invoke, with a blessed Crossbow creating more bolts and a cursed Crossbow creating fewer. Additionally, the Crossbow of Carl in a gnomish/hobbit Ranger's possession is magically lightened to 24 aum, the same weight as the Longbow.

Strategy

See also: Invoke § Optimum invocation schedule
